patterns: Delivery
Do you offer delivery?
Can I get my food delivered?
How do I order for delivery?
I would like to place a delivery
responses: We partner with popular delivery apps like Grab and Shopee Food. You can also place an order here, would you like to proceed? (yes/no)

patterns: Can I cancel my delivery order after placing it?
I want to cancel my delivery
Can you cancel my delivery?
responses: Orders can only be cancelled before preparation starts. Would you like to proceed?

patterns: What should I do if I receive the wrong order?
I received the wrong food
The food I get does not match with what I ordered
responses: Please contact us or the delivery service immediately for a replacement or refund.

patterns: Do you offer eco-friendly or biodegradable packaging?
Is there packaging for my food?
What packaging do you use for delivery?
responses: We use eco-friendly packaging for most of our takeaway items.

patterns: Do you provide utensils with takeout or delivery?
Will the delivery come with utensils?
Can I get a spoon and fork with the delivery?
responses: By default, we include utensils unless you request otherwise. Just let us know your preference.

patterns: Will hot items stay warm during delivery?
I want my food to stay warm
Will I get my food warm?
responses: We package meals in insulated containers to maintain temperature, but consider reheating if needed.

patterns: Can I request contactless delivery?
I want to have contactless delivery.
Can I get my food contactless?
responses: Just select “contactless delivery” when ordering and our rider will leave your order at your doorstep.
